row.entry: This module is an artistic feature that adds a solid layer of color to your image.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Several parameters control the effect of this module. Much more versatility can be reached if you apply blending or even conditional blending.

sect5.title: hue
sect5.para: Select the hue tone of the color layer.

sect5.title: saturation
sect5.para: Select the color saturation of shadow tones.

sect5.title: lightness
sect5.para: Select the lightness of the color layer.

sect5.title: source mix
sect5.para: This slider controls how the lightness of input image is mixed in. If you set this to zero a uniformly colored plane will result.
